title: The Teahouse of the Drowned Moon
tagline: A curator of digital ghosts must decipher a letter from her dead grandmother to unearth a past that is not finished with the future.
themes: Postcolonial Hauntings in a Cybernetic Present

chapters.title: The Window That Faces the Mountain

story: Write a letter from a future descendant, responding to a secret found in Zixin's archive.
Create a monologue from Old Man Fai's perspective, detailing the other 'ghosts' he has delivered.
Draft a 'consensus narrative' entry from the state archives about the Collapse, then write the marginalia Zixin would add to it.
Describe a memory that returns to Zixin's mother as the 'chosen forgetting' begins to crack.
technical: Design a speculative interface for Zixin's 'forensic palimpsest' software, visualizing corrupted data-streams as a physical landscape.
Prototype a tactile codex: a book where the raised, interlocking script of the second letter can be felt, triggering different audio fragments of the story.

cover_prompt: A young woman, a curator of digital ghosts, holds a translucent, century-old letter that glows with ethereal data-streams, its paper dissolving into a cascade of holographic tea leaves and fragmented family photographs, [Detailed Scene & Context: inside a hybrid teahouse where traditional wooden lattices are interlaced with neon-lit server racks and spectral faces flicker within porcelain cups, the air thick with the static of unresolved history], [Artistic Style & Medium: in the atmospheric, layered style of Annibale Siconolfi and James Jean, blending cyberpunk detail with painterly, haunting elegance, digital painting], [Composition & Camera: book cover framing, a centered and intimate composition with a shallow depth of field focusing on the letter and her hands, a low-angle shot looking slightly upward to convey monumental discovery], [Lighting & Color Palette: dramatic volumetric lighting where cool, ghostly blues and data-stream cyans pierce through the warm, sepia-toned gloom of aged paper and wooden interiors, punctuated by the deep red of a single, forgotten seal], [Quality & Technical Enforcers: masterpiece, best quality, ultra detailed, intricate details, professional composition, sharp focus, 8k resolution, flux dev].
